original_text: And the dove came in to him in the evening; and, lo, in her mouth was an olive leaf pluckt off: so Noah knew that the waters were abated from off the earth.
korean_text: 저녁때에 비둘기가 그에게로 돌아왔는데 그 입에 감람나무 새 잎사귀가 있는지라 이에 노아가 땅에 물이 줄어든 줄을 알았으며

sentences.original_text: And the dove came in to him in the evening
and, lo, in her mouth was an olive leaf
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보라, 그것의 입에 올리브 잎이 있었다

sentences.original_text: that the waters were abated from off the earth
